thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com | 3 of 281
thread.title: Monica
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Monica

author: Monica
title: Monica
text:
Late Tuesday I placed an order for delivery by Friday Morning. On Wednesday, they followed up in the morning, with me then adding 8 additional shirts an hour later. My order was received by Thursday at 10:30a.
R.O.T was in constant communication every step of the way. Will definitely order again and refer people!
ANNNDDD...even better, you get a live human when you call them!! :)
